titleStmt.title: His Majesties gracious speech to both houses of Parliament, at their prorogation, on Munday the 26th of January 1679/80.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by Benjamin Took and John Crook, printers to the King's Most Excellent Majestie; and are to be sold by Mary Crook at His Majesties Printing-house in Skinner-Row.,
